Data module¶

Contents

  • Data module
    • Data functions
    • Data class
    • Data1D class
    • Data2D class

Data functions¶

data.array(a, e)¶

Return a data.Data1D or data.Data2D instance depending on the dimensions of the passed arrays.

Parameters:
  • a¶ – Estimation. Must be convertible to a numpy.ndarray.
  • e¶ – Uncertainty. Must be convertible to a numpy.ndarray and must have the same shape as a.
data.log10(a)¶

Log10 of a Data array

data.sum(a)¶

Sum of a Data array

data.nansum(a)¶

Nansum of a Data array

data.mean(a)¶

Mean of a Data array

data.nanmean(a)¶

Nanmean of a Data array

Data class¶

class data.Data¶

Bases: object

Empty class that must be implemented by a particular Data class depending on the data dimensions (e.g. data.Data1D)

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

Data1D class¶

class data.Data1D(dat, err=None)¶

Bases: data.Data

This class can be used as a substitute to a 1D numpy.ndarray to store data.

Data can be stored with its error and general operations can be used to propagate the uncertainty with no effort, e.g.:

import orb.data as od
import numpy as np

x_dat = np.ones(5, dtype=float)
x_err = np.random.standard_normal(5)

a = od.array(x_dat, x_err)
b = od.array(x_dat, x_err)
c = a * b
print a
print od.mean(a)
print od.sum(od.log10(c))
print od.nanmean(a*b**2.)
__add__(b)¶

Implement self + b.

Parameters:b¶ – A numpy array or a Data instance. Must be broadcastable with self.
__div__(b)¶

Implement self / b.

Parameters:b¶ – A numpy array or a Data instance. Must be broadcastable with self.

Data2D class¶

class data.Data2D(dat, err=None)¶

Bases: data.Data1D

This class can be used as a substitute to a 2D numpy.ndarray to store data.

Data can be stored with its error and general operations can be used to propagate the uncertainty with no effort, e.g.:

import orb.data as od
import numpy as np

x_dat = np.random.standard_normal((5, 5))
x_err = np.ones((5, 5), dtype=float)

a = od.array(x_dat, x_err)
b = od.array(x_dat, x_err)
c = a * b
print a
print od.mean(a)
print od.sum(od.log10(c))
print od.nanmean(a*b**2.)
__getitem__(key)¶

Implement self[key]

Parameters:key¶ – data slice.
Returns:a data.Data2D instance.
__init__(dat, err=None)¶

Init of Data2D class.

Parameters:
  • dat¶ – Data map.
  • err¶ – Absolute error map. Must have the same shape as dat.
_check_data(m)¶

Check passed data map

Parameters:m¶ – data map (a 2D array)

Getter for dat property.

Called by a = self.dat.

_get_err()¶

Getter for err property.

Called by a = self.err.

Setter for dat property.

Called by self.dat = m.

Setter for err property.

Called by self.err = m.

Parameters:m¶ – uncertainty map

Called by a = self.dat.
